Package com.clover.sdk.v3.payments.api

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseIntentBuilder
    Base class for other intent builders to associate a request to the requesting application
    CapturePreAuthRequestIntentBuilder
    Use the CapturePreAuthRequestIntentBuilder class to capture a pre-authorized payment on a Clover device.
    CapturePreAuthRequestIntentBuilder.ReceiptOptions
    ReceiptOptions that allow the Integrator to control the receipt selection options on a per-transaction level.
    CapturePreAuthRequestIntentBuilder.ReceiptOptions.EmailReceiptOption
    EmailReceiptOption that allows the Integrator to control the Email receipt option.
    CapturePreAuthRequestIntentBuilder.ReceiptOptions.NoReceiptOption
    PrintReceiptOption that allows the Integrator to control the Print receipt option.
    CapturePreAuthRequestIntentBuilder.ReceiptOptions.PrintReceiptOption
    PrintReceiptOption that allows the Integrator to control the Print receipt option.
    CapturePreAuthRequestIntentBuilder.ReceiptOptions.SmsReceiptOption
    SmsReceiptOption that allows the Integrator to control the Sms receipt option.
    CapturePreAuthRequestIntentBuilder.SignatureOptions
    Signature options that allow the Integrator to control how the signature is collected on a per-transaction level.
    CapturePreAuthRequestIntentBuilder.TipOptions
    Tip options that allow the Integrator to control tipping on a per-transaction level.
    CloseoutResult
    The result of the Closeout request from Payments API QUEUED -- the closeout request was successful and has been queued FAILED -- the closeout request was unsuccessful for reasons other than open tips or preauths OPEN_TIPS -- the closeout request was unsuccessful because there are open tips OPEN_PREAUTHS -- the closeout request was unsuccessful because there are open preauths
    CreditRequestIntentBuilder
    Use CreditRequestIntentBuilder class to initiate a credit
    CreditRequestIntentBuilder.CardOptions
    Card options that allow the Integrator to control the use of cards.
    CreditRequestIntentBuilder.ReceiptOptions
    Receipt options that allow the Integrator to control the receipt selection on a per-transaction level.
    CreditRequestIntentBuilder.ReceiptOptions.EmailReceiptOption
    EmailReceiptOption that allows the Integrator to control the Email receipt option.
    CreditRequestIntentBuilder.ReceiptOptions.NoReceiptOption
    PrintReceiptOption that allows the Integrator to control the Print receipt option.

    PrintReceiptOption that allows the Integrator to control the Print receipt option.
    CreditRequestIntentBuilder.ReceiptOptions.SmsReceiptOption
    SmsReceiptOption that allows the Integrator to control the Sms receipt option.

    IncrementalAuthRequestIntentBuilder

    MarketingDecision  
    PaymentRefundRequestIntentBuilder
    Use the PaymentRefundRequestIntentBuilder class to initiate a payment refund on an Android device.
    PaymentRequestIntentBuilder
    Use the PaymentRequestIntentBuilder class to initiate a payment request on a Clover device.
    PaymentRequestIntentBuilder.CardOptions
    Card options that allow the Integrator to control the use of cards.
    PaymentRequestIntentBuilder.CardOptions.CashbackOptions
    CashbackOptions give you the option to disable Cashback suggestions or set your own cashback suggestions.
    PaymentRequestIntentBuilder.OfflineOptions
    Offline options that allow the Integrator to control a transaction's offline state on a per-transaction level.
    PaymentRequestIntentBuilder.ReceiptOptions
    Receipt options that allow the Integrator to control the receipt selection on a per-transaction level.

    PaymentRequestIntentBuilder.ReceiptOptions.SmsReceiptOption

    PaymentRequestIntentBuilder.SignatureOptions
    Signature options that allow the Integrator to control how the signature is collected on a per-transaction level.
    PaymentRequestIntentBuilder.TenderOptions
    Tender options allow Integrators to control Cash and Custom Tenders on a per-transaction level.
    PaymentRequestIntentBuilder.TipOptions

    RequestIntentBuilderUtils  
    RequestTipIntentBuilder
    Use the RequestTipIntentBuilder class to initiate a customer facing tip screen.
    RetrieveCreditRequestIntentBuilder
    Use the RetrieveCreditRequestIntentBuilder class to retrieve a previously processed credit on a Clover device.
    RetrievePaymentRequestIntentBuilder  
    RetrievePendingPaymentsRequestIntentBuilder
    Use the RetrievePendingPaymentsRequestIntentBuilder class to retrieve a list of pending (offline) payments
    RetrieveRefundRequestIntentBuilder
    Use the RetrieveRefundRequestIntentBuilder class to retrieve a previously processed refund on a Clover device.
    ReversePaymentRequestIntentBuilder
    Use the ReversePaymentIntentBuilder class to initiate a payment reversal (void or refund)
